decisions.description: This decision element evaluates which navigation button the user has clicked on.
decisions.name: Evaluate_Navigation_Decision
decisions.label: Evaluate Navigation Decision

decisions.description: This decision element evaluates the object type intended for this Application Success flow by checking which input Record Id was provided (Permit_Id, License_Id, or Application_Id).
decisions.name: Evaluate_Object_Type
decisions.label: Evaluate Object Type

decisions.description: This decision element evaluates the object type to update based on the provided input Record Id (Permit_Id, License_Id, or Application_Id).
decisions.name: Evaluate_Object_Type_for_Update
decisions.label: Evaluate Object Type for Update

decisions.description: This decision element evaluates whether the current record has any pending Fees or Submissions.
decisions.name: Evaluate_Pending_Submissions_and_Fees_Exist
decisions.label: Evaluate Pending Submissions and Fees Exist

Flow.description: CG - Updating submission logic for Pre-Application

formulas.name: OutstandingSubmissionsTextFormula
formulas.expression: IF({!AreSubmissions} = True, "You have outstanding submissions. Navigate to the Submissions tab to upload required documents.", " ")

formulas.name: TotalBalanceTextFormula
formulas.expression: IF({!Total_Balance}>0 , "Please pay outstanding balance amount of" + " $" + TEXT({!Total_Balance}), " ")

Flow.label: Application Success V1

fields.name: Error_Text
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong with this flow.


Contact us and include any error messages you see.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Display_Header_Pre_App
fields.fieldText: {!Record_Type_Name_Header} Request

fields.name: Application_Success_1
fields.fieldText: The {!Record_Type_Name_Header} application has been successfully saved. However, it has not yet been submitted to the Town of Clayton for a completeness check. Submission will occur once all required fees are paid and necessary documents are uploaded. Your reference number is {!Record_Name}.

fields.name: Body_Success
fields.fieldText: Your {!Record_Type_Name_Header} Request has been submitted. Your reference number is {!Record_Name}.

fields.name: Body_Submissions_Only
fields.fieldText: Before your application can be reviewed, please upload your required documentation as indicated below by clicking the “Submit Documents” button.

fields.name: Body_Fees_Only
fields.fieldText: Before your application can be reviewed, please pay for any fees owing as indicated below. You may pay these fees by clicking Pay Now below.

fields.name: Body_Submissions_And_Fees
fields.fieldText: Before your application can be reviewed, please upload your required documentation and pay for any fees owing as indicated below. You can submit your documentation by clicking Submit Documents below. You may pay these fees after submitting your documents by following the on-screen prompts.

fields.name: DR_ToScale_Requirements
fields.fieldText:
Requirements for your To-Scale Plot Plan are as follows:

1. Need to see property lines

2. Need to see where house is located

3. Need to see distance from Property Lines

4. Need to provide existing Impervious, as well as the proposed Impervious in this Plot Plan.

5. Need to provide detail on whether the Apron is being expanded or not within this Plot Plan.

6. Are there any pre-existing buildings on site? If so, please add to Plot Plan.

For more details, please visit our website here: https://www.townofclaytonnc.org/239/Permits-Applications

fields.name: OwnersConsentFormText
fields.fieldText:
Requirements for your Owner's Consent form are as follows:

Please download, fill out, and notarize the Owner's Consent Form from https://www.townofclaytonnc.org/ownersconsent

fields.name: Buffer_Determination_Letter_Requirements
fields.fieldText:
﻿Requirements for your Buffer Determination Letter are as follows:

Please click the link below for more information regarding buffer determination requirements

https://www.deq.nc.gov/about/divisions/water-resources/permitting/401-buffer-permitting-branch/riparian-buffer-protection-program

fields.name: Consultant_Fee_Text
fields.fieldText: Consultant Fee will be assessed once application details and summitted documents have been reviewed.

textTemplates.name: Action_Required_HTEXT
textTemplates.text:
{!OutstandingSubmissionsTextFormula}

{!TotalBalanceTextFormula}

variables.description: We need a boolean value - as we are no longer gathering submissions in just ONE getRecords
variables.name: AreSubmissions

variables.description: Record Id of the application Object (Permit, License, Application)
variables.name: Record_Id
